resources.string: Connect to internet and try again
This app needs to access your Google account (via Contacts)
Please install Google Play services from App store and relaunch app
Uh oh, do not have any any sheets. Create new one
This project is created for mobile programming course in Tampere University of applied sciences as part of degree programme in business information systems.
Application uses Google Sheets and Google Drive API. Google Sheets API is used to read and write users Sheets. Google Drive API is used to searching and creating Sheet files.

Time Tracker creates new folder to your Google Drive with name "time-tracker" and uses its files from there. Time Tracker searches and uses Sheets files which start with "time-tracker-". If you want to delete your time tracking files you can delete files in your Google Drive (Remember to remove it from your Google Drive Bin too!). You can also manually input time into Sheets files but it is recommended to use application for this.
File with that name already exists
